title: Doodles of SCP-999
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

I got bored at work and decided to doodle SCP-999. I didn't want to directly copy any particular version that I've seen, so I tried a few different body shapes just to see what would happen. The shape I ended up liking most is reminiscent of Stormtrooper helmets from the original Star Wars trilogy, though I'd like to try more in the future.

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-999 Doodles" hide="- Close"]]

[[<image 999%20doodle.jpg size="medium"]]

[[/collapsible]]
